website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for budget-conscious users who want to connect many devices.
pros: Can connect up to 15 WiFi-enabled devices to 4G LTE and 3G
Has a universal charger to external devices, making it a great multitasker
Color display makes data usage easy to read
Uses a secure password and offers parental controls
Up to 20 hours of usage time

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: The hotspot works however it only works off the battery power. You charge the jetpack up unplug it and it works however if you want to leave in in a remote location you can't simply plug it in as you can only plug it in to charge it. Tried taking the battery out and running it on wall outlet and it just shut itself off, Tried running it plugged in with the battery worked for about 5 minutes and then started recharging when it was done it shut off. In short if your not going to babysit the thing don't buy this but if you are it might work for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Crow T Robot

customer_reviews.title: Covered in sticky stuff.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it no stars I would. It showed up covered in a juice like liquid it obviously doesnt work. And they made returning it so difficult it's almost impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: just like the one I paid much more from Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Needed an extra jetpack. Took it to Verizon, they quickly got it hooked up to my account and it works perfectly, just like the one I paid much more from Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: Typer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected; Excellent battery life and signal strength
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best hot spot I've ever owned. I'm highly impressed with the battery life on this device, and also how easy it is to navigate through the menus. It also has a stronger signal than other devices I've used, and is truly "more bars in more places".
customer_reviews.author: Astrophotographer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a great way to receive excellent internet ...
customer_reviews.text: Jet Pack is the way to go when traveling! Great product and a great way to receive excellent internet reception from Verizon when traveling in your RV. Of course you will need to be in "Verizon Territority"
customer_reviews.author: N. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Unit does not work
customer_reviews.text: Unit doesn't work. It's constantly trying to reboot. Will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Complete-ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: This unit comes with a Verizon sim card and is ready to go. I could not find a way to authorize it at Verizon online on my existing account. Verizon online was trying to get me to pick a new plan, so I started a chat and that person got it done in just a few minutes. They need the IMEI number (15 digit #) and the number off the SIM card (20 digits in groups of 5-it's on the top side of the card, underneath the battery.) Really happy with this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Yodagirl

customer_reviews.title: Mifi Hotspot
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new Mifi Hotspot. However, I paid a lot more for it than I was expecting to pay. I had bought one several years ago and it was $50 on Amazon. This one was over $120! Verizon sells them for $49.95, but you have to sign a 2 year agreement. I did not want to sign a two year agreement, so purchased this Mifi Hotspot. Hotspot is great....don't like the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debora A.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This works just like it should and was very easy to configure. I paired this with an external antenna which helps me get better and more consistent service.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce2113

customer_reviews.title: Great value, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great price for item. Only reason it didn't receive 5 stars there was a network setting under advanced settings that had to be altered for devices to connect to internet. Verizon tech support was clueless how to resolve, 7 hours spent at store or on phone with tech support. They elevated to their 2 and still didn't resolve issue. However LUCKILY I am a network technician and once verizon failed miserably I dedicated time to pinpointing issue and resolved myself. The APN setting had to be reconfigured, once changed to vzwinternet from static worked perfectly. I am deep in the woods so I added a 11 db external antenna and have no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Verizon stated the device was corrupt and could not activate. Wasting an 1 hour and a half on the phone and another trip to the Verizon (pic of actual phone call). I should have listened to the other reviews. What a POS. What type of seller does not test their products before sending?!? I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Hotspot dysfunctional - rebooted itself about once/minute
customer_reviews.text: Hotspot dysfunctional - it rebooted itself about once/minute, no matter which Verizon service/plan we signed up for or which SIM we used or whether we reset the unit back to factory defaults. This company obviously is not verifying the integrity of what they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Washbear

customer_reviews.title: perfect hot spot for on the go users
customer_reviews.text: This amazing little box packs a punch. I have been able to get a signal everywhere I go. I has not dropped the connection even while traveling in the country. Sweet little box and affordable service plans. I am happy I bought this item.
customer_reviews.author: upset in ks

customer_reviews.title: Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a good traveling item for us we only have it connected through Verizon when we need it for long traveling and for long trips good quality made product and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: I like it. The signal where I would like to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The signal where I would like to use it is too weak to get anything higher than 3G. I went to a higher location and was able to use it. I would like to find something to boost the signal enough so that I could use it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Seller was responsive, product came on time and as advertised. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: 100% SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: My order was shipped the same day and arrived in advertised condition "Like New". Using on a GSM Network in Mexico and it works great.....very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: The jet pack works great but verizon data plan stinks
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R.

customer_reviews.title: is add describes nothing about this product being used and it was and had been opened
customer_reviews.text: The title say it all . The product was not marketed as used or opened before hand . The booklet in this product was written on as someone had wrote down a phone number 🤨🧐🤨
customer_reviews.author: Keoki Ebanks

customer_reviews.title: A Daily Downer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally a very happy Verizon customer, but this little box goes down almost daily on me. It doesn't get a lot of traffic, but I do have devices connected that ideally should be always connected for remote access. It's firmware was auto-updated (pushed by Verizon) a few weeks after I purchased/installed it. I'm not sure, but I think that is when the reliability of this product went bad. In all fairness, I haven't reported this issue to Verizon yet - I guess that is next on my todo list...
customer_reviews.author: Flying Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: So/so
customer_reviews.text: Beings that it was refurbished it seems to have problems recognizing the sim card. The charge port often needs cleaned or I'm always wiggling the cord. I do like that I can connect so many devices however, and I love the screen and being able to do so much from the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie McMillian

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We just leave it plugged in to ensure the battery stays fully charged. Works great. Verizon makes it really easy to buy data. Def would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and much sturdier than the first one I bought from Verizon
customer_reviews.author: HONESTY IS THE BEST POLICY

customer_reviews.title: Got internet
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for existing account. Looks good and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor pre-shipment checkout and documentation
customer_reviews.text: The unit appeared to be damaged internally. Apparently was not visually inspected before shipment. Website mentioned microSIM. But unit actually accepts only the NanoSIM card. Perhaps previous buyer attempted to forcefully insert the wrong SIM card. This is what the local Verizon dealer mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: i.m an rver and use a hotspot to connect to the internet, there is not always a wireless connection available, so I need a good hotspot and this seems to fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well at first, now it will not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Always keeps me secure being on the internet,no need to use public WiFi when you have this
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier.this mifi has been everything I expected,plus more,and the price was excellent. Use this for business and it performs excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: XX

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy from this reseller
customer_reviews.text: The seller sima .is dishonest. The jetpack isnt new and doesnt work
customer_reviews.author: fredys boyz

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great wifi device!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to my current Verizon MiFi 6620. I dropped mine and broke something on the inside so mine was malfunctioning. Since I would've had to pay Verizon full price I chose to purchase this replacement device off of Amazon and I am completely satisfied with the product. It arrived quickly and works perfectly. It was easy to switch online at Verizon wireless website and I have it up and running in five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetMedic

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Unlimited plan 70 bucks a month pre paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Seller sold mifi
customer_reviews.text: Mifi in rolling restart and it will not update between restarts.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can use it to charge my telephone ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well so far, I love that I can use it to charge my telephone in emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: D_J

customer_reviews.title: Came with a fully charged battery
customer_reviews.text: Didn't give any stars on "tech support" because I didn't need any tech support. I had the SIM card, so was able to use this in just a matter of a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, Verizon is of no help at all. not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mose Steier

customer_reviews.title: If you Travel this is a no-Brainer.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well and will also charge your phone. The "line" charge on Verizon is $10 a month, and the ability to take a call while surfing the web in the airport made it well worth it for me. Interestingly you can send text messages to this device, but can't respond or send calls to it. Not that I needed to do that, but it was interesting. The interface is easy to set up and it seems to have juice to serve Wifi to my Laptop for 18 hours. It can also be used as a USB Tether which is compatible with quite a few WiFi Routers.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N. Wirtz

customer_reviews.title: In a less populated area like I'm in now
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten as high as 67mbps down, and 35 up with this hotspot so far. I travel regularly, so I'll be testing it out all over the US. In a less populated area like I'm in now, I'm getting a solid 20/20 connection, which is more than adequate for getting work done.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Friday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used this in the car across country without losing connection.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. I tried it with 3 different SIM cards and it didn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I can easily see where to place it to get the consistent ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in a rural area, but somehow I am getting 4G LTE. This has given speeds of 10-12mps. The product shows when it is on 3G and 1X. Speeds are up to 1.36mps. However, I can easily see where to place it to get the consistent 4G LTE. I love it. My unlimited service was very frustrating wasting a lot of time online. With this, I am saving a lot of time and not using that much. For me, the speed is more important.
customer_reviews.author: Ellenoc

customer_reviews.title: This boy works just great and the price was right
customer_reviews.text: This boy works just great and the price was right! I went to my local verizon store and they couldn't match Amazon's price but what the heck. I went ahead and ordered it and was very pleased with the reception and it's broadcast distance. I also ordered the exterior antenna and it went to 4 bars. If Verizon doesn't keep upping the price after 6 months I'll give it 10 stars. So its a wait and see, but for now it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Myhre

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It quit working within a week. I need to return it
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bye this item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged by water! the little water markers under the battery are red and on the battery or red!!!!
customer_reviews.author: steve johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not able to connect to anything else besides my iPad.
customer_reviews.text: At first it was working but now it won't connect to anything but my iPad. I enter in the default password for wifi and for admin password but it keeps saying it's incorrect. I've never changed any of those. I wish to return this device for a working model. Please help. I've tried on several phones and my pc but can't access anything.
customer_reviews.author: David Purvis

customer_reviews.title: It comes to work with me and I can stream ...
customer_reviews.text: It comes to work with me and I can stream Pandora all day long. I don't use the USB to charge any devices. I can say if you disable the sleep and auto shut off you can get about a day and a half before it would need to be charged again.
customer_reviews.author: Teck

customer_reviews.title: Easy.
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of being at customer sites with no access to wifi. This links to my current Verizon plan and gives me coverage wherever I have cellphone access. Supports at least seven devices (most I've had on it so far). Easy.
customer_reviews.author: lytewayte

customer_reviews.title: Contacted vendor with poor response. Travel 12 months and need wifi access
customer_reviews.text: About 10 months and jetpack doesn't work. Tried a new battery didn't work. Contacted vendor with poor response. Travel 12 months and need wifi access.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good hotspot
customer_reviews.text: Faster than the previous-generation hotspot, and gets better LTE signal. Also the chipset inside this is supposed to support LTE Advanced once Verizon deploys it, so we won't have to upgrade to a new hotspot to take advantage of faster speeds when LTE comes along! Everything seems to work fine with this hotspot. Well worth it. Don't buy an older generation one though; they've been plagued with problems. This is the first generation Jetpack that has given us a stable connection that doesn't drop out.
customer_reviews.author: allquixotic

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this in order to avoid a contract and the pricing on this was fantastic. I recieved this yesterday and was excited t
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! I purchased this in order to avoid a contract and the pricing on this was fantastic. I recieved this yesterday and was excited to set up service with Verizon. When I went to establish service online, it came back saying I couldn't. I called in and they told me that this device had been placed on their "stolen list." I now feel as though that I need to bring it to a Verizon store so that the rightful owner gets it back, and that I have wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work and customer service is very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Works took awhile but they stayed on phone till it did
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure​ you power down. Watch WPS too. You will loose gbs fast.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks data like a super-Hoover
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks data like a super-Hoover. You can't leave it on all day or night, not using it doesn't stop it from doing whatever to drain your gigs. It's convenient enough to use when you need it, but turn it off when you're done. I had thought of canceling cable internet & just going with this. That idea is out the window now.
customer_reviews.author: Regularguy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ... eats up data too quick.
customer_reviews.text: Fast internet connection, However, the data would be eaten up fast because of graphics more than likely. Certainly not useful when attempting to print.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Martin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a new monitor and set my computer to factory mode 2 X!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Russell

customer_reviews.title: Delivered fast and better than expected for refurbished. Does not come with sim card.
customer_reviews.text: Mine was delivered today and I was very pleased to find it looked brand new, even had the clear cling wrap cover on the front. The battery was fully charged and looked new. The only thing it does not come with a sim card, but I already had one to use. I ordered the sim card from ebay Verizon Unlimited Data Plan Hotspot and it worked great. So I am very happy with my new MIFI6620L Verizon Hotspot Device.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Eugene Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have bought used mifi 6620Ls before. The conditions of the units have varied from inoperative to almost new. This one was exactly as described; bangs, scratches and tape residue however, it works. For my applications aesthetics is unimportant, I only require that they work. Good purchase would buy more if seller has more.
customer_reviews.author: George Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on these! They won't last longer then a few months!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this purchase!!!! I can't stay online for very long. The Jetpack worked great for 2 months and now it reboots over and over. I have tried resetting it and even bought a new battery. Nothing has worked. Huge waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not doing its job !
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it used. My Mifi has 2 IP addresses, it works great in the morning, but I can’t stream a movie in the evening, I don’t know what to do about it and the seller recommended to put it closer to a window. No help at all. It won’t even show how much data it has available for this month. It shows the same every time I turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Customer two

customer_reviews.title: Easy adapt if you are happy with Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple unit, works well; biggest disadvantage is which Data program to sign up for. After using Data limit it throttles back to an unusable speed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James D. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Returning for Refund - Turns off/on constantly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Mifi for home use. It turns off and on by itself constantly making it impossible for me to use it efficiently. I did find that sometimes if I set the screen timeout to Never, it will not shut off. But, then other times that trick doesn't work either. I would not buy this product, returning via Amazon for full refund. (Thanks Amazon!)
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: costs way too much
customer_reviews.text: The description here doesn't tell you that to get this to work, you must connect to a data plan with Verizon or someone else, which costs $30 to set up and then $20 a month. Not worth it. I paid $120 for this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lanoue

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my Mom to use on the road and around town and she loves it. She's a bit older so she doesn't always understand how to use the interface but its easy for her to start up and log on to and we can always help her with changing the password, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unit works great. Got tired of visiting clients and not having ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit works great. Got tired of visiting clients and not having access to wifi to do demonstrations. With this I always have a connection!
customer_reviews.author: Tidus

customer_reviews.title: Really don’t like it because it’s slow and it hangs up constantly
customer_reviews.text: Really don’t like it because it’s slow and it hangs up constantly. Very irritating especially when I’m on line. Very annoying when I’m watching TV and it keeps jumping off, on and off, on and off!
customer_reviews.author: sylveera

customer_reviews.title: Jetpak MIFI
customer_reviews.text: The item was exactly as described. I needed to replace my old one that died. It was easy to hook up and get me back online. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: NYYANKEE01

customer_reviews.title: Excellent MiFi for Internet signal
customer_reviews.text: This device works very well, holds a charge for at least 20 hours, provides strong signal, very pleased with this Jetpack
customer_reviews.author: D. Bramlet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great only problem is eats data fast which is server problem unlimited doesn't mean unlimited
customer_reviews.author: Kearn Chouest Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great device, but it's a shame it's only on Verizon
customer_reviews.text: I learned I hate Verizon from this device which is a shame, but I am going to try to use it with another service.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy With This Device
customer_reviews.text: We've had this device for a little over a month now, and haven't had problems with it until about a week ago. Now, the WiFi signal is consistently weak, -80 dBm from about 10 feet away, and intermittently drops. The UI is better than the 4620 we replaced, but the performance of the 6620L has been consistently under-par.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I lucked out.
customer_reviews.text: It said it was refurbished. It was like brand new. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Verizon plans for this are a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Just buy a phone and tether this thing is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as describef
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what was described, in perfect working order.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Skalka

customer_reviews.title: Short Range
customer_reviews.text: Signal is weak upstairs , but it is easily moved if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Just like your WiFi router at home
customer_reviews.text: The data is fast. We have had no issue getting 4G/LTE connections. We full-time RV travel. We have devices connected to this MiFi device all day long and have little to no connectivity problems. If you had issues with MiFi devices before, this one is the one you have been waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Julie

customer_reviews.title: I have not been able to use this hotspot since ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use this hotspot since I purchase it after activating it with Verizon. I have to take time out of my schedule to go to a Verizon store to see if there is a problem on their end or if it is an issue with this hotspot. Very inconvenient for me...
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item is sold without the SIM card required for its use.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: SIM card included
customer_reviews.text: Comes with teeny SIM card under battery. Appears to be a bit of white cardboard the size of a little fingernail. But no, that's the back of the SIM card. Push in on it (like an SD card)to eject it. The number, in miniscule script, is required by Verizon to activate the device. I tried tweezers the first time, and fortunately didn't wreck the SIM card. Lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Red Land

customer_reviews.title: Back in business at 4G.
customer_reviews.text: The previous, older unit did not last out the contract- dropped to 1x in about a year. This unit required a sim card, which I got at the local outlet for $25. This included all preparations and did not affect the contract in progress. I'm glad for the way that this worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I got this to cover me in low service areas ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to cover me in low service areas, but when my phone goes low on service, it gets low as well so sort of pointless for me at this moment. Product was as described by seller. But the product itself possibly needs an antenna to boost signal.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Holds a charge for a good amount of time
customer_reviews.text: Holds a charge for a good amount of time, nice range and always dependable. Took it on a three week trip from Florida to Canada through the Appalachian Mountains. By the way, no service in Canada, international issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to get new SIM card from Verizon that fit this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: Requires its ow separate Verizon account
customer_reviews.text: It needs its own account at Verizon. I dont want another Verizon bill every month
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Best feature is the GB left for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Best feature is the GB left for the month on your account. That is a handy feature! Only downside is will not support 5g and 2.4 at the same time. But that would require 2 radios more battery drain, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Slate

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just remember Verizon Customer Service & Tech Support sucks... and you will need them for this!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Harder

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately never got to use -- Verizon will not honor ...
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately never got to use -- Verizon will not honor my grandfathered unlimited internet access if I upgraded to this model although I was bringing my own device
customer_reviews.author: ehsim

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: I will never purchase anything from Verizon again. I called them before I purchased and got stuck in a stupid contract told them what I wanted it for...of course they lied and said it would work in the mountains! It didn't! Don't waste your money or get stuck I their money hungry contract.
customer_reviews.author: Norys Trevino

product_meta.title: Verizon MiFi 6620L Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot (Verizon Wireless)
